name: Roadside Target
description:
Hit man, psychopath or just a mass murderer?
In this game you are assigned a target and you need to use your
gamer reactions to find your target and shoot it before it passes
you, but be careful not to injure any innocents!

In this game you play as a not so subtle hit man who prefers to
do his job sat at the side of the road with a cooler full of beer.
To play, press any button on the keyboard or mouse- excluding
escape- to fire your gun. Aim for your target in order to gain more
ammunition and receive a new target. The aim of the game is to
kill as many targets as possible with the bullets you have whilst
killing as little innocents as you can.

When in the game, press any button to fire your gun, the 'Main Menu'
button to return to the main menu or the restart button to restart the
game.
